title: when I try to log in to Mozilla Thunderbird i get the message "log in to server imap.gmail.com (username) failed. yet I can access both my egmails thru google chrome

title: Display
content: I recently had my P.C. scammed and had to reinstall, I do not like the new version of Thunderbird and find it a real pain, can I reinstall the older version please, so much easier to use unless I am doing something wrong. Can you help me please. Regards Dennis.
creator: dennis.helmore

title: an not get mail from ionos on 115.8.1
content: I have been using IONOS mail server for years with few problems. However, two days ago I stopped getting new mail. I decided to try and use the fix inbox option in the pull-down and it ended up deleting my existing messages (received before my problem). I contacted IONOS and my mail server is working fine, I can go directly to that server and read my e-mail. I tried uninstalling TB and reinstalling it but still can not receive my messages. There also seems to be a problem when I send the message does not get copied to my "Sent" folder. Spent about 3 hours on the phone with IONOS and tried everything they could come up with and still no mail. I have sense tried to add another mail account but get the message that "the incoming account already exists". Removed existing accounts, uninstalled TB and tried again. TB automatically remembered my accounts and added them back and I get the "already exists" message again. Tried a couple more uninstall combinations and still no mail from the IONOS server. Help.
creator: cddunn100

title: Problems with email passwords
content: Why has Thunderbird started to continuosly ask for the passwords for my email accounts? And why do all my attempts to enter my passwords result in failure? I am unable to send or receive any emails at the moment. If anyone is able to help I'd be very grateful.
creator: richard.howells

title: smtp authentication rejected some hours after wan ip address is changed
content: I have been using Thunderbird for years on Windows and then Linux with few problems. My friend has a newly set up Windows 11 laptop and Thunderbird for email. ISP is BT and email is btinternet.com. Incoming IMAP email works fine but outgoing SMTP keeps failing on authentication. Rebooting the router, which changes the wan ip address, fixes the problem for a time (less than 12 hours). Tested with Telnet. Same rejection. I'm wondering if the problem may be something to do with Thunderbird polling the server too frequently. Outgoing email on my friend's iPhone works fine but I don't know how it connects to the internet.
creator: e_james

title: Is There a Way to Automatically Run Filters on the Sent Folder?
content:
I sort messages into folders using filters. Each folder has its own address book of people whose messages go to that folder.

But if I send a message from my phone, it goes to the Sent folder and stays there.

Is there a way to automatically run filters on a folder (Sent) when TB starts up? Or even better, also run it when TB refreshes after a hiatus - for example, when TB stays open when the PC goes to sleep and wakes up again.
creator: Toolworker

title: Thunderbird is entirely incapable of working with Microsoft Exchange
content:
I am using Thunderbird for my university account. They provide a tutorial on setting up Thunderbird here.

When I follow these steps, I am unable to send emails. I can fetch my inbox, but that's it. I cannot fetch deleted, sent, draft, or junk items. I cannot see any contacts, I cannot see my calendar.

I am using verison 115.8.1.
creator: imjustero

title: Unable to send emails
content: My partner and I use thunderbird on a windows 10 laptop. We both have independent email addresses but share the same outgoing server settings apart from those email addresses. My partner is able to send emails but I keep receiving the message that the message cannot be sent, please check outgoing server settings. I have compared both of our outgoing settings and they are identical apart from the independent email addresses. Please advise best course of action. Thank you Gary Wood
creator: gw.wood

title: změna pořadí složek v účtu
content: V účtu mám několik složek. Potřebuji změnit jejich pořadí. Dříve to umožňovaly doplňky dorando keyconfig, folderplane tools, manualy sort folders. Všechny jsou v TB 115 zakázány. Můžete mi, prosím, poradit jak mohu pořadí svých složek upravit podle mých potřeb?
creator: ZdenekC
